name: EPICKA Universal Travel Adapter, International Power Adapter with 2 USB-A & 3 USB-C Ports Wall Charger - Worldwide Travel Essentials, European Travel Plug Adapter for UK/US/AU (TA-105C, Blue)
short_description: WORLDWIDE ADAPTER - Our all-in-one adapter is equipped with 4 different plug types that could plug into the sockets of 200+ countries and regions: Type C (most popular type) for use in most of Europe, including France, Germany, Italy, Spain, Iceland, Greece, and many other countries; Type G for UK, Ireland, HK, Malaysia, Singapore; Type I for China, Australia, New Zealand, Argentina; Type A for USA, Mexico, Canada, and Japan. It does NOT work in India and South Africa.

3 USB-C AND 2 USB-A PORTS - Charge multiple USB devices simultaneously at high speed through 3 USB-C port (3A) and 2 USB-A ports (2.4A). Ideal for charging smartphones, smart watch and fitness tracker, tablet, power bank, camera, handheld game console, headsets, and everything else that is charged through a USB port.

VERSATILE AC OUTLET - Accept not only US plugs, but also various plugs from EU countries, UK, AU and China. Note: Our adapter does NOT convert voltage (US/Canada: 110-120V, most other countries: 220-230V), ensure the AC-powered device intended to use abroad supports dual voltage (the input spec reads “100-240V, 50/60Hz” on it). For electric toothbrush, shaver/trimmer, water flosser, garment steamer, hair straightener, CPAP machine, it is critical to check the specs before your trip.

ABOUT HIGH-POWER APPLIANCES OVER 2000W - Many hair dryers, irons and electric kettles fall into this category. Even if they support dual voltage, it is still NOT recommended to use them in a country with different voltage due to potential hazards (the built-in 10A fuse might pop to prevent further damage). Many manufacturers do NOT make dual voltage high-power devices (for a reason), and NO portable voltage converters can handle such high-power safely over an extended time.

PORTABLE AND SAFE - This compact and lightweight travel essentials is ideal for travelers, overseas business, work, and students. It does not have surge protection and can be conveniently used on a cruise ship as well. Built-in 10A fuse, safety shutters, separate plug lock system, RoHS, CE, and FCC certifications provide extra peace of mind. TIPS: If you need more fuses, you can search for "TA-105C replacement fuse" on Amazon for purchasing. Please ensure that you're selecting Epicka 10A fuses.

【IMPORTANT】- This is NOT a voltage converter; compatible with dual voltage devices (does not convert voltage from 220V to 110V or vice versa), please check your device’s voltage to ensure it is compatible with the country.
